title: No account transfer?
body: So I am in the us army and im deployed right now but when i had free time i tried to play LOL but the ping was too high so i switched to an EU server to have just a little better ping but im going to be coming home soon and I wanted to switch back to NA server but the option to buy an account transfer. Is it only a one time deal?

replies.body: Account transfers are closed in preparation of end of season rewards, and not expected to return until November 20.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can see if any exceptions can be made.  Sorry about that!
Oh ok good to know it was not permanent, I'll do that thank you!
